reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 847: DESIGNATIONS UNDER CLAUSE 16 (1) (N) OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: DESIGNATIONS UNDER CLAUSE 16 (1) (n) OF THE ACT
reg_info.citation: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 847: DESIGNATIONS UNDER CLAUSE 16 (1) (N) OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Occupational Health and Safety Act   Loi sur la santé et la sécurité au travail

content.content: 1. The following occupational health and safety medical clinics are designated for the purpose of subclause 16 (1) (n) (i) of the Act: 1. Occupational Health Clinics for Ontario Workers Inc. — Hamilton Clinic. 2. Occupational Health Clinics for Ontario Workers Inc. — Toronto Clinic. 3. Occupational Health Clinics for Ontario Workers Inc. — Windsor Clinic. 4. Occupational Health Clinics for Ontario Workers Inc. — Sudbury Clinic. O.Reg. 741/91, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following occupational health and safety medical clinics are designated for the purpose of subclause 16 (1) (n) (i) of the Act:

1. Occupational Health Clinics for Ontario Workers Inc. — Hamilton Clinic.

2. Occupational Health Clinics for Ontario Workers Inc. — Toronto Clinic.

3. Occupational Health Clinics for Ontario Workers Inc. — Windsor Clinic.

4. Occupational Health Clinics for Ontario Workers Inc. — Sudbury Clinic. O.Reg. 741/91, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The following safety and accident prevention associations are designated for the purpose of subclause 16 (1) (n) (ii) of the Act: 1. Construction Safety Association of Ontario. 2. Electrical Utilities Safety Association of Ontario. 3. Revoked: O. Reg. 901/93, s. 1 (1). 4. Health Care Occupational Health and Safety Association. 5. Industrial Accident Prevention Association. 6. Ontario Natural Resources Safety Association/Association ontarienne de securité au travail — ressources naturelles. 7. Revoked: O. Reg. 901/93, s. 1 (3). 8. Transportation Safety Association of Ontario. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 847, s. 2; O. Reg. 901/93, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
2. The following safety and accident prevention associations are designated for the purpose of subclause 16 (1) (n) (ii) of the Act:

1. Construction Safety Association of Ontario.

2. Electrical Utilities Safety Association of Ontario.

3. Revoked: O. Reg. 901/93, s. 1 (1).

4. Health Care Occupational Health and Safety Association.

5. Industrial Accident Prevention Association.

6. Ontario Natural Resources Safety Association/Association ontarienne de securité au travail — ressources naturelles.

7. Revoked: O. Reg. 901/93, s. 1 (3).

8. Transportation Safety Association of Ontario. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 847, s. 2; O. Reg. 901/93, s. 1.

content.content: 3. The Worker’s Health and Safety Centre is designated as an occupational health and safety training centre for the purpose of subclause 16 (1) (n) (iii) of the Act. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 847, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. The Worker’s Health and Safety Centre is designated as an occupational health and safety training centre for the purpose of subclause 16 (1) (n) (iii) of the Act. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 847, s. 3.
